name: The Clans - Saga of the Twins
summary: Experience a point-and-click adventure RPG game like never before featuring seven playable female characters and a male vampire in this not-so serious tale. Catz and Kitsune desire to go on an adventure with Xenonight who have no choice but to follow them. Eventually they meet a mysterious vampire known as Lilith Bloodrose and end up being in a deep trouble. Can you help them face their threats and satisfy Catz's adventurous mind?
